name: Pier 62 Skatepark
description: Free public skatepark on Pier 62 in Hudson River Park. Great river views and solid design.
history: Opened 2010 as part of Hudson River Park. Designed with input from local skaters.
bestTimes: Early mornings or late evenings. Midday gets busy with tourists.
transitDirections: C/E to 23rd St, walk west. 1 to 23rd St.

detailedNotes.terrain: Features include bowl, ledges, rails, stairs, banks, flat bars. Well-maintained concrete construction.
detailedNotes.culture: Part of the Manhattan skate scene in Chelsea. Opened 2010 as part of Hudson River Park. Designed with input from local skaters.
detailedNotes.tips: Best approach: C/E to 23rd St, walk west. 1 to 23rd St.. Early mornings or late evenings. Midday gets busy with tourists.
detailedNotes.warnings: Public skatepark â€” standard park etiquette applies.
